name: Magazyn
overview: The preview of this game by Robert Szacki aka Hexmage960 was presented at RetroKomp 2018 , it finished 7th. Sokoban remake. This game received several graphical overhauls for the 2021 full release. Among the improvements: – New graphics – In each setting there will be different animations. – The hero will be fully animated. – Blocks will move smoothly, not abruptly like before.
